title: Heavy Equipment Sales & Repair Albany, GA | Yancey Bros.
text: Yancey Bros. Co. – Albany 1604 South Slappey Blvd., Albany, GA, 31701Yancey Bros. Co. – Albany Store Information 1604 South Slappey Blvd. Albany , GA , 31701 Mon : 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM Tue : 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM Wed : 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM Thu : 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM Fri : 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM Sat : Closed Sun : Closed Tyler Ward MACHINE SALES Albany’s Heavy Equipment Sales & Repair Dealer Yancey is Albany, GA and nearby areas’ Cat® Dealer for heavy equipment sales and service. We service all brands of equipment with the largest team of technicians and mechanics in Georgia. Popular Equipment - Track Skid Steer Loaders - Mini Excavators - Dozers - Backhoe Loaders - Forestry Equipment - Landscaping Equipment - Agricultural Equipment Popular Service & Repair - Customer Value Agreements (customized parts and service for one flat-rate) - 24/7 Mobile Equipment Repair - Hydraulic Cylinder Repair - Filters & Fluids - Scheduled Oil Sampling & Testing - Undercarriage Repair & Service Yancey has the largest team of technicians and most service bays in Georgia. With over 195 field service trucks and over 500 service technicians, our product support surpasses the combined competition.
